text:
NEW YORK UNIVERSITY
OFFICE OF THE CHANCELLOR
WASHINGTON SQUARE, NEW YORK 3, N. Y.
January 27, 1953
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
Station WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Mr. Ausmus:
The January NAEB Newsletter lists me as a
member of the Promotion and Publicity Com¬
mittee, and this brings up the question of
representation from New York University.
When the University membership was approved,
I asked Mr. Schooley, the treasurer, to carry
the University membership in the name of
Warren A. Kraetzer, our Radio-Television Co¬
ordinator.
Perhaps I should have written to you directly
at that time. Since Mr. Kraetzer is specifi¬
cally assigned to this activity, I should
appreciate it if you would transfer the insti¬
tutional membership from my name to his.
Sincerely yours.
Ik),
rames W. A
issistant
X
Chancellor
cc: Mr. Kraetzer
